pages.text: The $(item)Hammer of Heat$() is a $(marked)Rite Tool$() of $(c)火焰$(), with a moderate item power. $(br)It is mainly used for Forging Rites, as it allows them to be executed much cheaper, as no materials have to be spent on Rite Materials of Fire.
The $(item)Archaic Hammer Head$() can be found in houses of blacksmiths; however, it can also be crafted.
